scripts.pre-commit: bun run check:line-limits && bun run typecheck && bun run preflight
scripts.preflight: if ! command -v osascript >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Missing: osascript (macOS built-in).'; exit 1; fi; if ! command -v awk >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Missing: awk (macOS built-in).'; exit 1; fi; if ! command -v cliclick >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Missing: cliclick. Install with: brew install cliclick'; exit 1; fi; if ! command -v screencapture >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Missing: screencapture (macOS built-in).'; exit 1; fi; echo 'Preflight checks passed.'
